instructions: From any Home screen, tap the Apps icon . Tap Email. Tap the Compose icon in the bottom left of screen. Enter the recipient s email address in the To field. Enter the email subject the Subject field. Enter the email message in the Compose email field. Tap the paperclip icon to attach a file. Locate the file (by default, your pictures and videos are stored in the Gallery). Navigate to the desired file. Tap the file to insert it in the email. Tap the blue envelope icon at the top right of the screen to send the email.

From any Home screen, tap the Apps icon . Tap Email . If the email account you want to use is not the Inbox currently displayed, tap Inbox at the top of the screen and then tap the desired account. Once in the account, tap MORE . Tap Edit . To the left of each desired message deleted, tap the check box to select the check box. Tap the Trash can icon and then tap Delete .
